Name: Charge! Spirit Legion Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Charge! Spirit Legion mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This Charge! Spirit Legion Mount enables you to double-jump and move at a considerably fast speed. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will automatically fly toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Charge! Spirit Legion mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120

h1.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
